message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob.  I take a bit more considering the inflation disparity.
Your turn Alice. I need a bit more than that to make it worthwhile. This offer is better for you than waiting.
Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer still favors you considering the inflation. We need to reach an agreement soon.
This is my final offer Alice. It's more than fair to me considering the inflation is hitting you harder. Take it or leave it.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We both lose if this keeps up.  I'm proposing an even split.  Take it before the money shrinks even more.
